alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln County through 400 PM CDT... At 321 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxwell, or 17 miles east of North Platte, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brady, Maxwell, Keith, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area and Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 189 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
